text: Polymesoda is a genus of clams in the family Cyrenidae.Bouchet, P. and S. Gofas. (2014). Polymesoda Rafinesque, 1820. Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species. They were previously in the family Corbiculidae,Polymesoda. Integrated Taxonomic Information System (ITIS). before it was subsumed into Cyrenidae. Species include: *Polymesoda acuta *Polymesoda anomala *Polymesoda arctata *Polymesoda bengalensis *Polymesoda boliviana * Polymesoda caroliniana (Bosc, 1801) – Carolina marsh clam *Polymesoda exquisita *Polymesoda floridana *Polymesoda fontainei *Polymesoda inflata * Polymesoda maritima (Orbigny, 1842) – maritime marsh clam *Polymesoda meridionalis *Polymesoda mexicana *Polymesoda notabilis *Polymesoda obscura *Polymesoda ordinaria *Polymesoda powelli *Polymesoda proxima *Polymesoda radiata *Polymesoda tribunalis ==References== Category:Cyrenidae Category:Bivalve genera
title: Polymesoda
